name: RickAndMorty FanGame
description:
Defend the ship from the attacks of Mr Meeseeks!

As a huge fan of the Rick and Morty series, I have decided to make this game for non-commercial and  portfolio purposes only.

Donwload, unzip, run the .exe and enjoy!

This is the base game with basic mechanics, if required I am willing to update it by adding power ups, new mechanics and a story-based adventure.

Hope you like it!
